name: electricity production, deep geothermal | electricity, high voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/16771/documentation

Currently, this technology is not used for electricity generation in this country, annual production volume zero. However, this technology is supposed to contribute to capactiy expansion/replacement between today and 2030. This dataset represents electricity production with a deep geothermal enhanced geothermal systems plant. The power generation unit is run on an Organic Rankine Cycle with Benzene as working fluid. ;Detailed information on this dataset is presented in the book "Energy from the Earth. 2015. Hirschberg, Wiemer, Burgherr (eds.) (see field "Data Generator and Publication").

This dataset starts from commissioned geothermal power plants ready to generate electricity.

This activity ends with the high voltage electricity produced at the power plant.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Current annual production volume is zero. However, this technology is supposed to contribute to capacitiy expansion/replacement between today and 2030.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Represents installation of a deep geothermal power plant in Switzerland. Used as first approximation for GLO. Uncertainties adjusted accordingly.

publication.name: S Hirchberg, S Wiemer, P Burgherr2015
